languages.text: "Могу приказать Глейто укусить тебя, ведьма, тогда ты точно поймешь, что не спишь. Ну как, уже взбодрилась?"
languages.translation_comment:
Start of Chapter 4, about having just escaped from Commorragh.
Idira: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"

traits.locale_text: "Могу приказать Глейто укусить тебя, ведьма, тогда ты точно поймешь, что не спишь. Ну как, уже взбодрилась?"

languages.text: "I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"
languages.translation_comment:
Start of Chapter 4, about having just escaped from Commorragh.
Idira: "I've been thinking... Are we definitely back? Could this be another kind of torture cooked up by Tervantias? Some twisted dream?"
languages.original_text: "Могу приказать Глейто укусить тебя, ведьма, тогда ты точно поймешь, что не спишь. Ну как, уже взбодрилась?"

traits.locale_text: "I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"
"I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"

"I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"

languages.text: 「グライトにお前を噛めと命じてやってもいいんだぞ、魔女。そうすれば確実にわかるだろう？…おや、もう頭がはっきりしてきたようだな？」
languages.original_text: "I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"

traits.locale_text: 「グライトにお前を噛めと命じてやってもいいんだぞ、魔女。そうすれば確実にわかるだろう？…おや、もう頭がはっきりしてきたようだな？」

languages.text: "Ich könnte Glaito befehlen, Euch zu beißen, Hexe, dann hättet Ihr Gewissheit. Oh, schon fühlt Ihr Euch viel wacher, was?"
languages.original_text: "I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich könnte Glaito befehlen, Euch zu beißen, Hexe, dann hättet Ihr Gewissheit. Oh, schon fühlt Ihr Euch viel wacher, was?"

languages.text: « Si vous voulez être sûre qu'il ne s'agit pas d'un rêve, je peux ordonner à Glaito de vous mordre, sorcière. Oh, vous vous sentez déjà plus lucide, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous voulez être sûre qu'il ne s'agit pas d'un rêve, je peux ordonner à Glaito de vous mordre, sorcière. Oh, vous vous sentez déjà plus lucide, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: «Puedo ordenar a Glaito que le muerda, bruja, y entonces saldría de dudas. Ah, qué rápido ha recobrado la lucidez, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"

traits.locale_text: «Puedo ordenar a Glaito que le muerda, bruja, y entonces saldría de dudas. Ah, qué rápido ha recobrado la lucidez, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: “我可以让格雷托咬你一口，女巫，这样你就知道自己是不是在做梦了。噢，你已经清醒过来了吧？”
languages.original_text: "I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"

traits.locale_text: “我可以让格雷托咬你一口，女巫，这样你就知道自己是不是在做梦了。噢，你已经清醒过来了吧？”

languages.text: "Glaito'yu üzerine salarsam gününü görürsün cadı. Nasıl, aklın başına geldi mi?"
languages.original_text: "I could order Glaito to bite you, witch, then you would know for sure. Oh, feeling more lucid already, are you?"

traits.locale_text: "Glaito'yu üzerine salarsam gününü görürsün cadı. Nasıl, aklın başına geldi mi?"
